content.query:
--openrowset will not work here

--first create dedicated sql pool in mange tab

--connect  to that pool 

--as db is already created we can simply create internal table here

CREATE TABLE tabl1
(
empID	int	,
name	varchar(30)	,
gender	varchar(30)	,
country	varchar(30)	,
salary	int	,
department	varchar(30)	

)
WITH(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
    

)
GO

--drop  table tabl1

insert INTO tabl1 values  (1,'Navya','female','India',10000,'IT')
insert INTO tabl1 values (2,'Kavya','female','India',10000,'IT')
insert INTO tabl1 values (3,'Ramya','female','India',100000,'Sales')
insert INTO tabl1 values (4,'Phani','male','US',1000,'HR')
insert INTO tabl1 values (5,'Chaitu','male','China',10000,'IT')
GO

select * from tabl1





CREATE  table tabl2
WITH(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)AS 

select empID,name,department from tabl1


select * from tabl2



CREATE TABLE tabl4
(
empID	int	,
name	varchar(8000)	,
gender	varchar(8000)	,
country	varchar(8000)	,
salary	int	,
department	varchar(8000)	

)
WITH(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
    

)
GO

--https://synapsestorage1505.blob.core.windows.net/input/salary_data.parquet
--abfss://input@synapsestorage1505.dfs.core.windows.net/salary_data.parquet


COPY INTO tabl4
FROM 'https://synapsestorage1505.blob.core.windows.net/input/salary_data.parquet'
WITH(
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    MAXERRORS = 0
)
